value.title: NEW WORLD RECORD! 1 Terran vs 7 Insane Random AI by HeroMarine (PiG Reacts) - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I challenged StarCraft 2 Pros to take on 7 Random INSANE Cheater AIs at once! uThermal broke the world record last week with his 1 Terran vs 7 Insane Zerg AI video.
